classification_data.text: Julio César Suaza Contador Público EL SUSCRITO CONTADOR PÚBLICO JULIO CÉSAR SUAZA, IDENTIFICADO CON LA CÉDULA DE CIUDADANÍA No. 14.963.157 DE SANTIAGO DE CALI Y TARJETA PROFESIONAL No. 9881-T CERTIFICA QUE: 1°.) A la fecha, la composición Accionaria de la sociedad MEGASERVICIOS DE INGENIERÍA S.A.S., con NIT: 805.031.602 – 7, es de 2.000 acciones con un valor nominal de $ 50.000 cada acción, para un: CAPITAL AUTRIZADO $ 800.000.000 CAPITAL SUSCRITO $ 704.200.000 CAPITAL PAGADO $ 430.000.000 [TABLE] ACCIONISTA | VR. ACCIÓN | PARTICIPACIÓN ACCIONARIA | NÚMERO DE ACCIONES DORA MATILDE TREJOS PUERTA, C.C. 31.953.854 | 50.000 | 50% | 7.042 JUAN CARLOS ESCOBAR WELSCH, C.C. 16.733.280 | 50.000 | 50% | 7.042 TOTAL | | | 14.084 2°.) Este certificado se expide por solicitud expresa del señor JUAN CARLOS ESCOBAR WELSCH, representante Legal de MEGASERVICIOS INGENIERÍA S.A.S., NIT: 805.031.602 – 7, para trámites legales, comerciales y/o bancarios. Para constancia de los anterior, se firma en la ciudad de Cali, a los veintitrés (23) días del mes de septiembre de dos mil veinte (2020). JULIO CÉSAR SUAZA Revisor Fiscal T.P. No. 9881 – T E-Mail: julicesua@gmail.com Móvil: 315 2962850 Cel 315 496 2860 E-mail julicesua@hotmail.com Cali - Colombia

No. 9881-T - Contact information 2. **PRIORITY CHECKS** - Not BLANK - has substantial meaningful content - Not LINK_ONLY - no hyperlinks/URLs as primary content 3. **ISSUER IDENTIFICATION** - Not DIAN - no DIAN logo or header - Not Chamber of Commerce - no "Cámara de Comercio" mentioned - Issued by a public accountant - Julio César Suaza - Corporate certification document revealing company ownership details 4. **DOCUMENT FUNCTION ANALYSIS** The certification provides a comprehensive overview of MEGASERVICIOS DE INGENIERÍA S.A.S., detailing its precise ownership structure with two shareholders holding equal 50% stakes. It confirms the company's capital composition and share distribution, serving as an official verification of the firm's corporate structure. 5. **CATEGORY CLASSIFICATION** I've determined this is an ACC document, definitively categorized by its clear focus on shareholding composition. The certification contains key ownership indicators like shareholder percentages, identification details, and share allocation, making it a precise corporate ownership record. 6. **CONFIDENCE VALIDATION** The document's credibility is robust. Shareholder details are meticulously documented, with explicit ownership percentages and identification, confirming its authenticity as a comprehensive shareholding certification.
